tool.name: Wrap text
tool.help:
Help ----
Any text files uploaded will typically need to be wrapped in a LAPPS container before they can be using in a LAPPS processing pipeline.
Formats =======
Plain Text The ``discriminator`` will be set to `http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/text <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/text>`_. and the ``payload`` will contain the text string. Lapps Interchange Format (LIF) The discriminator will be set to `http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/jsonld#lif <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/jsonld#lif>`_ and the ``payload`` will contain the JSON serialization of the a `Container <http://wiki.lappsgrid.org/org.lappsgrid.serialization/groovydoc/org/lappsgrid/serialization/lif/Container.html>`_ object. Text Corpus Format (TCF) The discriminator will be set to `http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/xml#tcf <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/xml#tcf>`_ and the ``payload`` with contain TCF/XML with the text.
